passages.text:
Welcome to the sample Twine story!

This is a demonstration of how Twine stories can be imported into the PixelCrusher Dialogue System.

passages.name: Next
passages.text:
NPC: This is the second passage. Notice how I've specified an actor at the beginning of the text.

You can use macros like (set: $visited to true) to set variables.

[[Go back to start|Start]]

passages.name: Formatting
passages.text:
You can use //italic// and ''bold'' formatting in your text.

You can also use [[(direct links)]] to link directly to another passage without an intermediate link entry.

passages.name: Advanced
passages.text:
This passage demonstrates how to use sequences, conditions, scripts, and descriptions.

[[Go back to start|Start]]

Sequence:
AudioWait(hello);
AnimatorPlay(wave)

Conditions:
Variable["visited"] == true

Script:
Debug.Log("Advanced passage visited");

Description:
This passage is only accessible if the player has visited the second passage.
